title: Role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, make a role in your channel, but do not make an alignment/goal.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host will choose somebody's role to replace depending on what will keep the game most similar to how it was before.
- The host can deny any role.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak Faction, the host will instead replace roles depending on what helps your team the most.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the town.

desc:
Post 4737
*There are no ideas left in my head*
